p: The MOI for HBV infection of PPHs using HepAD38 cells as viral source was different compared with that using patient serum as viral source. The majority of viral particles from HepaAD38 are naked, whereas the majority of viral particles in the patient serum are intact. Therefore, different MOI was used in HBV infection with different viral sources, which has been suggested for successful HBV infection in our previous publications ( 8â€“ 10).
